description:
Chinatsu is an unlucky girl, a hard-worker who`s trying her best to earn enough money to stay in her expensive private school.  Her luck takes an even bigger turn for the worse when she`s caught up in the WIXOSS game. Under heavy stress and facing the possibility of annihilation, she loses her temper and lashes out at a fellow student.  The only thing keeping her going is her desire to be a good role model for her old friend Suzuko, and even that is starting to waver...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La jeune fille / idéal et réalité
